phrases: The VVV Project?
Given their stated position of peace through neutrality, JIOR cannot possess a big military.
And so, they developed weapons that could take on an entire fleet singlehandedly.
So that is what the Valvraves are...
Still, I am amazed that you managed to develop weapons that fit the bill so perfectly.
It was because of the runes.
At the risk of oversimplifying, I suppose you could think of them as information particles.
All physical matter is composed of atoms.
In a similar vein, information is composed of indivisible units called runes.
Or so they tell me.
So they tell you?
Are not you a member of the development team?
Uh, right after I was assigned here, I butted heads with the top brass.
I was demoted to test subject caretaker.
Test subject...
You mean the students?
Every last student at this school is being uniquely modified.
That is why all the teachers were military.
We are their caretakers.
Why is that woman the only exception?
Nanami-chan is a special case.
We were set up to look like an ordinary school,
so I guess they felt they had to stick in a PE student teacher.
Stick in.
Receive.
Insert?
It is a pretty weird program wizard, huh?
Only VVVI has one.
Only VVVI can use that Harakiri Blade, too.
This unit seems to be special.
Hey, nobody told me about this Kamitsuki stuff!
No, we did not.
Well, I knew.
Look, I know this might come as a shock, but try to stay calm, okay?
Stay calm?
This is totally bad-ass!
This is your usual immortal anti-hero deal!
Do we have a special pose or something?
Thank goodness he is so stupid...
Say what?!
Now, now...
Let us all try to get along.
We are going to be a team from now on, right?
A team...
In other words, none of us is alone.
Yeah!
So much for being alone together...
Not at all, it would appear that my staff treated you quite rudely.
I will apologize again once the ceremony is over.
Ceremony?
You and your students are heroes.
Of course there will be a ceremony.
Between the international congress and media interviews, things are about to become quite hectic.
I must be going.
Let us meet on the Moon, Representative Rion Nanami.
I cannot...
I cannot keep doing this.
I am sorry I am all dirty!
Miyamoto said his favorite model had been buried.
Found it!
I can relate...
I could not bear it if my favorite shirt got buried!
Here!
Go on, try it!
I know, are not they great?!
I totally recommend these!
Potato chips dipped in red chile oil!
Hey, once we get to the Moon, come shopping with me at the supermarket!
I know these!
You like these wafers?
The fukujinzuke relish coating on these is so good!
And if you fry them, it takes them to a whole new level!
The trick is to use olive oil!
What do you say, Akira-chan?
Experiment?
Yeah.
It is in our best interest to learn more about what our bodies can do, right?
You have a point.
Let us start with jumping jacks.
Duration and number.
And then...
Hey...
Is that true?
I am saying that we should test it out.
What are you talking about?
What?
Hey!
Say something!
C'mon, man up!
You are ignoring me?!
We all know you like her!
Right?
Right?
Well, I guess...
Let me show you my special stash!
It is enormous...
You can use a ruler for that?
I know, right?
This will do the trick for sure.
Everyone, this is student teacher Rion Nanami.
We will be arriving at the Moon soon.
Oops, I did not mean to rhyme!
When we arrive, we will need a representative
for various international negotiations and interviews and things.
Up until now, I have done what I can to fill that role, but I do not think it is right.
It should not be because someone is older or a teacher or whatever.
And so, I think we should hold an election!
An election for the Prime Minister of JIOR!
An election?
We are going to be the countrys leaders?
That is a great idea!
I want to try it!
We have the 7th off, let us do it then!
We are technically off now!
That sounds like fun!
It sure does!
Prime Minister...
As you can see, our food self-sufficiency has been improved to 17.
And this is not the only benefit to come from the Seven R's.
Senpai, who will you vote for?
Is not it obvious?
For the winning candidate.
Our public relations activities via the wired are also going all-out now.
To give an example
I am running for election, too!
Thank you for your support!
So you were serious, Yamada...
How many times do I have to tell you it is Thunder?
To keep our secret, it would be best if one of us was in a leadership position.
You run, Haruto.
I cannot!
I just do not have it in me.
Yeah, somebody crazy like Shoko would be a better fit.
If it is crazy that matters, he might actually be a good choice.
Say what?!
It is a compliment!
She is saying that you are more of a leader than I am.
Oh, she is?
I suppose I am...
You are a real sweetheart, ain'tcha?
Thanks.
I am surprised.
I did not expect you to volunteer to act as election supervisor.
I am a refugee, so I do not have voting rights.
I assume you are not trying to pull a fast one on us again?
The election of a representative aligns with my own objectives.
It will be a fair election.
I thought you wanted to quit being our representative.
I do not want to run away from it.
If I am going to represent everyone,
I want to be properly chosen to do it.
I see.
You would have made one hell of a teacher.
Do not treat me like a child!
Sorry, my bad!
He was not elected student council president three years in a row for nothing.
Trapped in a room together...
I will keep you girls safe.
Also, your mouth...
There is too many words coming out of it.
Takahi-senpai, I
Get over yourself!
I do not care how famous you are or that you are a pilot!
You are just an underclassman to me!
Before this war broke out, I did not even know your name!
I am not as
What is wrong, Tokishma?
Takahi-senpai, stand back...
Miss Rukino?!
You go after everything, do not you?
Haru-tard, you cannot jump her just because she is got a sexy body.
Oh.
Um, I...
She is right!
You are so sexy
I mean lovely, that I could not help myself.
Dressed like that, you are asking for all kinds of unwanted attention from the boys.
I am really sorry!
Wait a minute!
Come back!
The interval between attacks is shortening?
I am scared.
What if it keeps getting shorter and eventually reaches zero?
I am worried that I will run around attacking people like some kind of animal.
Haruto.
If that ever happens, I will put you down.
If I am going to be killed by someone, I would like it to be you.
Shoko!
Miss Rukino...
Um, are you guys training?
No, we just bumped into each other, and
You are not running?
The election.
No, no!
I am not cut out for that stuff.
It should be a third-year who
Hey!
The members of the Youth Culture Club decided to vote for you, Shoko!
You saved my Shadow X, remember?
And I hear you went to the student council president and renegotiated the Light Music Club's budget!
I only did that because I am a fan of theirs.
What is this?
Are you going to run in the election, Shoko?
No, no way!
You would do a great job!
I know it!
You have got to run!
But I am just not
You have always been there at our matches, cheering us on!
And you have always brought us food, too!
I honestly think you can do it, Shoko!
Cut it out, I am not like that at all.
You are giving me too much credit, really!
Oh, come on!
Do it!
I cannot, I cannot!
If they can reach the neutral territory of the Moon, we will no longer be able to move against them.
This next battle will likely be the last.
We will not let them escape, sir.
We swear on the honor of the Karlstein Agency.
I will be joining you this time.
If the Valvraves slip through my grasp, it might cost me my head.
Never!
Impossible, you are the Chancellor's close friend.
That was not the case 20 years ago.
And he was not the Chancellor then, either.
Are you concerned about the royalists staging a comeback, sir?
That is part of it...
Where is H-neun?
Playing hooky, sir!
My dear!
You and me, we are like peas in a pod!
Us running into each other here, do not you feel the hand of fate at work?
What are you doing here?
That is a long story...
For now, how about some tea?
Where is Shoko?
Is not she with you?
She said she would catch up with us later.
Why do you ask?
She just seemed like she was not her usual self.
You think?
She did not look all that different to me.
Well, she was just
Haruto.
Can I trust you to look out for Shoko?
I will come right out and ask her what is wrong.
I will leave her to you, then.
I will go look for her!
Do not be late!
Got it!
Shoko!
So does this mean that Prime Minister Sashinami has been killed?
Take a look at the signature on the declaration of unconditional surrender.
It says Acting Prime Minister Yamamoto, see?
It is possible that he fled, but in all likelihood...
Shoko...
What was that just now?
He is alive.
He is alive, I know it.
Why do we have to pick a new prime minister?
Do not bury my dad in the past...
Do not assume he is dead.
Shoko...
How long have you known?
No way...
Since way back then?
But that would mean this whole time,
she is been carrying this all alone.
May my dad be safe.
I am such an idiot!
Why did not I see it?
All this time, Shoko's been fighting by herself!
Fighting all alone!
Just you wait, Shoko.
I will bring your father back with me.
Do not worry.
Even if I am not around, Miss Rukino is here.
L-elf, too.
Haruto, wait!
It is crazy!
You cannot do it alone!
I know it is crazy, but I am going anyway.
You do not know what you are saying!
If you did, you would not go!
No, I am going.
He is not your father, Haruto, he is mine!
It is none of your concern!
Of course it is!
Because you are crying!
Someone who is precious to me is crying!
If this is not a time to do something crazy, what is?
Someone precious... to you?
Oh, um, I just meant...
Basically, I am ready to go that far for you.
I mean, we have known each other forever...
Um...
Thank you, Haruto.
I will run in the election.
I want to fight alongside you, too, Haruto.
I want to stand shoulder to shoulder with you, not just be protected all the time.
Shoko...
Besides, if we are going to save anyone, it should be all our families.
Yeah.
It is time.
Wait!
I am running in the election, too!
I figured you would come.
What is this?
Your application.
I already filled in all the required fields.
Thanks,
Marie!
Haruto.
I want to straighten this up before heading back.
It will not work out, not between a Kamitsuki and a human.
Maybe you are right.
Are you an idiot?
A like without getting something back is not a like that will last.
Even so, I am going to
Haruto?
Are you okay?
In closing, I pledge to you a better food situation, a steady supply of power,
and a stable lifestyle with these Seven R's.
He is as persuasive as ever.
He is the student council president, after all.
He makes you want to vote for him!
Next is our final candidate.
Shoko Sashinami of Year 2 Class B.
Nobody likes it when somebody wins without a fight.
Oh, she decided to run after all!
Shoko, you can do it!
Guys!
When we get to the Moon,
let us hold the school festival!
The school festival?
W-What is she saying?
Hold the school festival?!
I would go for it.
Come on, take this seriously!
It was called off because of the war, remember?
I am so psyched about it!
I mean, last year's was awesome!
Right, Otamaya?
Me?
You showed me the monster suit for that movie you were making, remember?
I have been looking forward to seeing it at the school festival!
Yeah, that movie's our pride and joy!
I thought as much!
Takano-senpai!
We all swooned over your Romeo last year!
This year, we are doing The Cherry Orchard!
But with all the genders reversed!
That I have got to see!
Shoko!
Come hear our performance, too, okay?
We were able to get our instruments fixed, thanks to you!
Will do!
I will see it for sure!
Come eat at our booth, too!
I am looking forward to your Machida Special!
Our exhibit's going to be awesome, too!
I want to make ours a coffee shop!
It will be revenge for last year!
The zero-G ballet was amazing!
Sashinami, we are fighting a war!
We do not have the luxury of throwing a school festival!
That is why we have to.
He is right, we are in the middle of a war.
There is no telling when we might die.
That is exactly why I want to hold the school festival!
This might be the only chance we will ever get to be students!
Club activities, field trips, field days, there is a ton of things that I want to do!
I do not want to give up a single one of them!
What do you say, everyone?
Let us be more selfish!
I know that it will give us a reason to go on fighting!
It will get us amped up!
I have a reason to go on fighting, too!
When we get to the Moon...
Um, this is just me, mind you...
Um, how can I put it?
I... I am going to tell the person I like exactly how I feel!
I have a reason to keep going, too!
Do you think she means me?
No way!
She means me!
Hey, are you okay?
Are you having trouble breathing?
Go ahead and body-jack me.
I feel fine.
I have one, too!
To be the richest man in the world!
To compete in the inter-high tournament!
To make my pro debut!
To become even stronger!
To buy as many GX3000's as I can!
I-I will profess my feelings, too!
To become a novelist!
To make 100 friends!
Guys, let us do everything that we have always dreamed of!
Let us become the kings of selfishness!
Hey!
W-What are you thinking
We only go around once in life!
The things we want to do!
The dreams we want to fulfill!
Let us try to do them all!
Let us do it!
Yeah, you only get one life!
Let us be selfish!
This cannot be happening...
Is this
When we get to the Moon, let us all do whatever we want!
Let us find something different!
Something new!
Now I get it...
This really is a curse, is not it?
I know we are going to be okay!
I know we can do it!
Tell me Haruto...
Do you think I did okay?
This says that Shoko won.
Next time, episode 11, Military Tribunal 54.
Valvrave the Liberator...
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
